ShortSummary: Effect of jacket getting fully wet
LongSummary: Customer inquired about water-resistance and battery life of the jacket; now asking what happens if it gets fully wet.

Messages.Text: Hi, thinking about getting the ThermoGear Heated Jacket Pro V2 for a winter hiking trip. Is it really water-resistant and how long does the battery last on medium setting? Thanks.

Hi, thank you for reaching out. According to the manual, the ThermoGear Heated Jacket Pro V2 is made from a durable, water-resistant material, providing excellent protection against wind and rain. However, it is not submersible. Additionally, the battery life on the medium setting is up to 7 hours. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
Thanks for the info. What happens if the jacket gets fully wet?
